content.question:
<math alttext="Equation 1: 2 C u, solid, plus O 2, gas, react to produce 2 C u O, solid, where delta H naught equals, negative 312 kilojoules per mole of reaction." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mo> </mo><mi>Cu</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mo> </mo><mi>CuO</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">°</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>312</mn><mo> </mo><mi>kJ</mi><mo>/</mo><msub><mi>mol</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>
<math alttext="Equation 2: 2 C u, solid, plus one half O 2, gas, react to produce C u 2 O, solid, where delta H naught equals, negative 171 kilojoules per mole of reaction." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mo> </mo><mi>Cu</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo> </mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mi>Cu</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">°</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>171</mn><mo> </mo><mi>kJ</mi><mo>/</mo><msub><mi>mol</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>
Based on the information above, what is the value of <math alttext="delta H naught" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>H</mi><mtext>°</mtext></math> for the following reaction?
<math alttext="C u 2 O, solid, plus one half O 2, gas, react to produce 2 C u O, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Cu</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo> </mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mo> </mo><mi>CuO</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 483 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mn>483</mn><mo> </mo><msub><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="negative 141 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mn>141</mn><mo> </mo><msub><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="positive 141 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>141</mn><mo> </mo><msub><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="positive 483 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>483</mn><mo> </mo><msub><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 141 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mn>141</mn><mo> </mo><msub><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
